original:
Arthur Miles was known throughout the literary community as a well-respected book critic. His sharp wit and discerning taste had earned him a following of avid readers who eagerly awaited his every review. But Arthur harbored a dirty little secret: he was a corrupt critic, willing to sell his integrity for a hefty sum.
One fateful day, a notorious and eccentric writer named Victor Veracruz approac
sampled:
Arthur Miles was known throughout the literary community as a well-respected book critic. His sharp wit and discerning taste had earned himself a following of avid bibliophiles who eagerly awaited his every review. But Arthur harbored a dirty little truth: he was a corrupt critic, willing to sell his integrity for a hefty sum.
One fateful day, a notorious and eccentric writer named Victor Veracruz approac
